content: **from the website **this pattern works up quickly and looks great i like to use the same color for the toe and heel and then do stripes through out as the need or want arises it makes the stocking look more interesting and uses up a lot of scrap christmas yarn formerly available on geocities october 1 2011 website registration expired still available at this archived link 1 1 http //web archive org/web/20100628174741/http //www lindaslists net/cstocking htm
